function.name: generateImage
function.description: Generates exactly one image using DALL-E 3. Do not make multiple calls to this function in the same conversation turn. Only generate one image per user request.

prompt.description: A detailed text description for generating exactly one image. Do not generate multiple images.

size.description: The size of the single generated image.

style.description: The style of the single generated image. 'vivid' for hyper-real and dramatic, 'natural' for less hyper-real.

function.name: searchWeb
function.description: Searches the web using a string search query and returns results for the LLM to use in crafting a thoughtful, informed response to the user's request.

query.description: The search query to be used for web search.
